desc: We serve, honour and seek to be guided by our Creator in all of our actions and activities.
We strive to strengthen and support the voices of Muslim women in our area.
We speak out on issues affecting Muslim women locally, nationally and internationally.
We provide opportunities for women to learn, share and develop communication and leadership skills to become active members of the Muslim and larger communities.
We constantly strive to build bridges with the larger community, and to partner with other organizations for mutual benefit
We actively welcome Muslim women of various cultures, ethnic backgrounds and diverse religious expression.
We welcome and respect diversity in thought and reach decisions as a group through discussion and democratic means.
We act with integrity and are accountable to our community.
